oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The deliverable D3.1 "Specification of wireless sensor network for Lifestyle Protocol implementation" describes the general architecture of the wireless sensor network that will support the data acquisition for the implementation of the DOREMI protocol. It also includes an analysis of each subsystem that composes the network, with technical descriptions of the requirements and specifications of the selected parts and components. The tools designed for integrating and calibrating this complex system are also specified, in order to give a complete vision of the infrastructure supporting the DOREMI activities and the interfaces between the hardware components and the DOREMI applications.
